abstract: Darren Goforth, Harris County sheriff's deputy, is fatally shot in full uniform at Houston, Tex, gas station; killer is still at large.
lead_paragraph: A uniformed Harris County deputy was fatally shot in suburban Houston late Friday as he was pumping gas, the sheriff’s office said.

headline.main: Texas: Sheriff’s Deputy Is Fatally Shot at Gas Station
headline.print_headline: Texas: Deputy Is Shot at Gas Station

snippet: A uniformed Harris County deputy was fatally shot in suburban Houston late Friday as he was pumping gas, the sheriff’s office said.
